attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stop giving goverment money to foreigners we are in a recession and to many people out of work so its about time we stopped giving hand outs to people that have never payed in to our system

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
